member.name: IWICFastMetadataEncoder.Commit
member.summary: Finalizes metadata changes to the image stream.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICFastMetadataEncoder.GetMetadataQueryWriter
member.summary: Retrieves a metadata query writer for fast metadata encoding.
member.param: When this method returns, contains a pointer to the fast metadata encoder's metadata query writer.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICFastMetadataEncoder
member.summary: Exposes methods used for in-place metadata editing. A fast metadata encoder enables you to add and remove metadata to an image without having to fully re-encode the image.
